title: ennaaLLu urakE
sahitya:
ennALLu UrakE induvO jutAmu evaraDigEv ru lEdA shrI rAma



anupallavi



konnALLu sakEtapura mEla lEdA kOrika munulaku gonasAga lEdA



caraNam



sati mATala nAlakinci sadbhakta kOTula samrakSincaga lEdA

matimantula

    brOchE matamu mAdana lEdA satatamu shrI tyAgarAjanuta nammaga

lEdA
